nodes.text: Geredi was a Duros pazaak player in the Pazaak Den on Nar Shaddaa. Twik'gar wanted Meetra Surik to fetch Geredi for a pazaak debt.

The Exile could take a dark side path where she threatened to turn him over to Twik'gar. He begged her not to and in exchange for not turning him over, he lost sufficiently at pazaak to finish his side quest and brought the Exile another step closer to facing The Champ.
